verses.name: Genesis 46:1
verses.text: And Israel took his journey with all that he had, and came to Beer–sheba, and offered sacrifices unto the God of his father Isaac.

verses.name: Genesis 46:2
verses.text: And God spake unto Israel in the visions of the night, and said, Jacob, Jacob. And he said, Here am I.

verses.name: Genesis 46:3
verses.text: And he said, I am God, the God of thy father: fear not to go down into Egypt; for I will there make of thee a great nation:

verses.name: Genesis 46:4
verses.text: I will go down with thee into Egypt; and I will also surely bring thee up again: and Joseph shall put his hand upon thine eyes.
